part.narration: The second wave of employees is here! Strange, such expansion with bankruptcy on the brain. Yuki looks at the candidates in the waiting area and grins.
part.line: You are all among the second in Sega's equal opportunity employment effort.
We have just begun a new project and are expanding our staff!
part.narration: Writer Sebastian Mimieux stares at Yuki, brow a-raise. He folds his arms.
Internationalization Lead Haruka Mimieux shifts in her chair a bit, pulling on her maternity dress. She labors to turn to Sebastian. She pats him on the back. She turns back to Yuki and smiles:
part.line: Are you sure you're not overexerting yourself?
Sure as sunshine, sweetheart! Pushin' pens never hurt no-one.
This is ridiculous, I'll do the job—
Oh, hush up. It's best we both help little Taro.
part.narration: Sebastian slumps in his chair. He sighs.
part.line: Family in. The Mimieuxs fist-bump. Family in. For our future son. Yuki sniffles. Son, huh? Yuki conducts the interviews.
